subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise did not conjure the decisive goal in overtime in Game 4 — Scott Gomez did that — but he loomed large in the Devils’ 4-3 victory.
snippet: Zach Parise did not conjure the decisive goal in overtime in Game 4 — Scott Gomez did that — but he loomed large in the Devils’ 4-3 victory.
